articles.title: US Military Says Destroyed 8 Drones Near Yemen, Hit 4 More On Ground - NDTV
articles.description: American forces shot down eight drones near Yemen and destroyed four more on the ground, the US military said Saturday, announcing a series of incidents that took place the previous day.
articles.content:
No injuries or damage were reported from the drones downed over open water, says US. (Representational)

articles.title: April 8 solar eclipse: 4 telescopes and observatories where you can watch totality - Livescience.com
articles.description: The April 8 total solar eclipse will be visible from several astronomical observatories across North America. Here are four that have big events planned for the day the sun disappears.
articles.content:
